content: <style=PlayerName>{me}</style>, are you helping Yunguo find a place for her new home? Remember, the surrounding area will be cleared when you place it.
info: 云果选址-莎莎闲聊_主流程文本II

content: Ensuring everyone's living in a safe environment is my top priority! <style=SizeSmall>Though, places that are too safe can be quite boring.</style>
info: 云果选址-莎莎闲聊_主流程文本II

content: {A两眼放光}It's like a strong gust of wind comes along and — whoosh! All the flowers, grass, and trees get cleared away. It's so wild! That's why deciding where to place a building is such a big deal.

content: Yunguo seems a little... shy? I greeted her a bit too loudly earlier, {A害羞挠头}and I think I startled her! Oops, tee-hee.

content: Oh, hey <style=PlayerName>{me}</style>! What're you up to?{A灵光一现} Wanna go patrol 300 laps around our Planette with me?
